example.parse: (VP (PSEUDO_VERB لكن) (NP-SBJ (PRON_1P نا)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM مصرون) (PP (PREP على) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نقول) (NP-SBJ (NP (PRON_1P نحن)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC الصحافيين))) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC كلمت) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))))

arg.g: On to say, we journalists, our words

example.arg: على أن نقول نحن الصحافيين كلمتنا
